nodes.text: The Blade series was a series of rugged but somewhat primitive atmospheric fighters and starfighters produced by, among others, Tarrvin-on-Kallik on Adumar. Blade series fighters were distinguished by mounting both forward- and aft-firing laser cannons. Most were designed for atmospheric combat, but could be modified relatively easily for space use. Some models even featured hyperdrives.
All Blade models about which significant details are known had split tails.
